import styles from "../../Css/complain.module.css"; import Navbar from "../../Components/nav/nav"; import {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {io} from 'socket.io-client' let socket; function Complain() { const title = 'Complain' document.title = 'Dumbmerch | ' + title useEffect(() => { socket = io('http://localhost:5000') loadContact() return () => { socket.disconnect() } }) const loadContact = () => { socket.emit("load admin contact") socket.on("admin contact", (data) => { console.log(data) }) } return (
